00058 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00059 #include <config.h>
00060 #include <stdio.h>
00061 #include <stdlib.h>
00062 #include <library/trace.h>
00063 #include <library/select_sort.h>
00064 #include <library/set.h>
00065 
00066 #undef DEBUG
00067 
00068 /*
00069  *      scale the importance of level information.
00070  */
00071 #define SCALE           5
00072 #define FAVOR_FORWARD   2
00073 
00074 /*
00075  *      There was problems with the trace.c program.
00076  *      Ofter too may jumps are generated.
00077  *      Also, loop entry blocks are sometimes chosen
00078  *      as the seed and became the middle of a trace.
00079  *      In this version, I will try to do two things:
00080  *      for frequently executed sections, reduce the
00081  *      dynamic jumps, for less frequently executed
00082  *      sections, reduce the number of static jumps.
00083  *      The new scheme should require no second level
00084  *      trace placement.
00085  */
00086 #undef WEIGHT_BASED
00087 #define SECOND_LEVEL_SELECT
00088 
00089 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 static void
00091 Punt (char *mesg)
00092 {
00093   fprintf (stderr, "> error in trace selection: %s\n", mesg);
00094   exit (1);
00095 }
00096 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /*
00098  *      I will define the extension field.
00099  */
00100 static struct Ext
00101 {
00102   Set dominator;
00103   int level;
00104   int order;
00105 }
00106 others[MAX_GRAPH_SIZE];
00107 static int n_others = 0;
00108 
00109 static void
00110 FreeExtensionFields (void)
00111 {
00112   int i;
00113   for (i = 0; i < n_others; i++)
00114     {
00115       Set_dispose (others[i].dominator);
00116       others[i].dominator = 0;
00117     }
00118   n_others = 0;
00119 }
00120 static void
00121 AddExtensionFields (FGraph graph)
00122 {
00123   Node ptr;
00124   Arc arc;
00125   struct Ext *ext;
00126   int change;
00127   Set all;
00128   FreeExtensionFields ();
00129   if (graph->nodes == 0)
00130     return;
00131   if (graph->root == 0)
00132     Punt ("no root node");
00133   all = 0;
00134   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00135     {
00136       nodeExt (ptr) = (others + n_others);
00137       others[n_others].dominator = 0;
00138       others[n_others].level = -1;
00139       others[n_others].order = n_others;
00140       all = Set_add (all, n_others);
00141       n_others += 1;
00142     }
00143   ext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (graph->root);
00144   ext->level = 0;
00145   ext->dominator = Set_add (0, ext->order);
00146   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00147     {
00148       if (ptr == graph->root)
00149         continue;
00150       ext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (ptr);
00151       ext->dominator = Set_union (0, all);
00152     }
00153   /*
00154    *  compute dominators.
00155    */
00156   change = 1;
00157   while (change != 0)
00158     {
00159       change = 0;
00160       for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00161         {
00162           Set dom, temp;
00163           if (ptr == graph->root)
00164             continue;
00165           arc = sourceArcs (ptr);
00166           if (arc == 0)
00167             {
00168               dom = 0;
00169             }
00170           else
00171             {
00172               dom = Set_union (all, 0);
00173               for (; arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00174                 {
00175                   ext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (sourceNode (arc));
00176                   temp = Set_intersect (dom, ext->dominator);
00177                   Set_dispose (dom);
00178                   dom = temp;
00179                   temp = 0;
00180                 }
00181               ext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (ptr);
00182               dom = Set_add (dom, ext->order);
00183               if (Set_same (dom, ext->dominator))
00184                 {
00185                   Set_dispose (dom);
00186                 }
00187               else
00188                 {
00189                   Set_dispose (ext->dominator);
00190                   ext->dominator = dom;
00191                   change += 1;
00192                 }
00193             }
00194         }
00195     }
00196   all = Set_dispose (all);
00197   /*
00198    *  compute level.
00199    */
00200   change = 1;
00201   while (change != 0)
00202     {
00203       change = 0;
00204       for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00205         {
00206           int max;
00207           ext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (ptr);
00208           if (ext->level >= 0)
00209             continue;
00210           max = -1;
00211           for (arc = sourceArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = arc->next)
00212             {
00213               Node src;
00214               struct Ext *ex;
00215               src = sourceNode (arc);
00216               ex = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (src);
00217               /* ignore back-edges */
00218               if (ex->order >= ext->order)
00219                 continue;
00220               if (ex->level < 0)
00221                 break;
00222               if (ex->level > max)
00223                 max = ex->level;
00224             }
00225           if (arc == 0)
00226             {                   /* all source have been visited */
00227               ext->level = max + 1;
00228               change += 1;
00229             }
00230         }
00231     }
00232 #ifdef DEBUG
00233   printf ("--------------------------------------------------\n");
00234   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00235     {
00236       ext = nodeExt (ptr);
00237       printf ("# id=%d, order=%d, level=%d, ",
00238               ptr->id, ext->order, ext->level);
00239       PrintSet (stdout, "dominator", ext->dominator);
00240     }
00241 #endif
00242 }
00243 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00244 static double
00245 successor_node_weight (Node src, Node dest)
00246 {
00247   struct Ext *extSRC, *extDEST;
00248   int diff;
00249   double weight;
00250   extSRC = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (src);
00251   extDEST = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (dest);
00252   /*
00253    *  when choosing a successor, select one
00254    *  that is closer to it (level information)
00255    *  when the dynamic count is low.
00256    */
00257   diff = extDEST->level - extSRC->level;
00258   if (diff > 0)
00259     {
00260       weight = nodeWeight (dest) + ((FAVOR_FORWARD - diff) * SCALE);
00261     }
00262   else
00263     {
00264       weight = nodeWeight (dest);
00265     }
00266   return weight;
00267 }
00268 static double
00269 predecessor_node_weight (Node src, Node dest)
00270 {
00271   struct Ext *extSRC, *extDEST;
00272   int diff;
00273   double weight;
00274   extSRC = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (src);
00275   extDEST = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (dest);
00276   diff = extDEST->level - extSRC->level;
00277   if (diff > 0)
00278     {
00279       weight = nodeWeight (src) + (diff * SCALE);
00280     }
00281   else
00282     {
00283       weight = nodeWeight (src);
00284     }
00285   return weight;
00286 }
00287 static double
00288 successor_arc_weight (Arc arc)
00289 {
00290   struct Ext *extSRC, *extDEST;
00291   int diff;
00292   double weight;
00293   extSRC = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (sourceNode (arc));
00294   extDEST = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (destinationNode (arc));
00295   diff = extDEST->level - extSRC->level;
00296   /*
00297    *  when choosing a successor, select one
00298    *  that is closer to it (level information)
00299    *  when the dynamic count is low.
00300    */
00301   if (diff > 0)
00302     {
00303       weight = arcWeight (arc) + ((FAVOR_FORWARD - diff) * SCALE);
00304     }
00305   else
00306     {
00307       weight = arcWeight (arc);
00308     }
00309   return weight;
00310 }
00311 static double
00312 predecessor_arc_weight (Arc arc)
00313 {
00314   struct Ext *extSRC, *extDEST;
00315   int diff;
00316   double weight;
00317   extSRC = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (sourceNode (arc));
00318   extDEST = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (destinationNode (arc));
00319   diff = extDEST->level - extSRC->level;
00320   if (diff > 0)
00321     {
00322       weight = arcWeight (arc) + (diff * SCALE);
00323     }
00324   else
00325     {
00326       weight = arcWeight (arc);
00327     }
00328   return weight;
00329 }
00330 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00331 /*
00332  *      Heuristic solution.
00333  */
00334 static Arc (*best_successor_of) (Node);
00335 static Arc (*best_predecessor_of) (Node);
00336 static double min_prob_requirement = 0.0;
00337 /*
00338  *      Selection by node weight.
00339  */
00340 static Arc
00341 best_successor_1 (Node node)
00342 {
00343   Node src, dest;
00344   Arc ln, best;
00345   src = node;
00346   /*
00347    *  Find a destination node with the largest weight.
00348    */
00349   dest = 0;
00350   best = 0;
00351   for (ln = destinationArcs (src); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00352     {
00353       Node new_node;
00354       new_node = destinationNode (ln);
00355       if (dest == 0)
00356         {
00357           dest = new_node;
00358           best = ln;
00359         }
00360       else
00361         {
00362           if (successor_node_weight (src, new_node)
00363               > successor_node_weight (src, dest))
00364             {
00365               dest = new_node;
00366               best = ln;
00367             }
00368         }
00369     }
00370   /*
00371    *  The selected node must be unvisited, and
00372    *  has non-zero weight.
00373    */
00374   if ((dest == 0) || (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED))
00375     return 0;
00376   if (nodeWeight (dest) == 0.0)
00377     return 0;
00378   /*
00379    *  Return the best link.
00380    */
00381   return best;
00382 }
00383 static Arc
00384 best_predecessor_1 (Node node)
00385 {
00386   Node src, dest;
00387   Arc ln, best;
00388   dest = node;
00389   /*
00390    *  Find a source node with the largest weight.
00391    */
00392   src = 0;
00393   best = 0;
00394   for (ln = sourceArcs (dest); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00395     {
00396       Node new_node;
00397       new_node = sourceNode (ln);
00398       if (src == 0)
00399         {
00400           src = new_node;
00401           best = ln;
00402         }
00403       else
00404         {
00405           if (predecessor_node_weight (new_node, dest)
00406               > predecessor_node_weight (src, dest))
00407             {
00408               src = new_node;
00409               best = ln;
00410             }
00411         }
00412     }
00413   /*
00414    *  The selected node must be unvisited, and
00415    *  has non-zero weight.
00416    */
00417   if ((src == 0) || (nodeStatus (src) & VISITED))
00418     return 0;
00419   if (nodeWeight (src) == 0.0)
00420     return 0;
00421   /*
00422    *  Return the best link.
00423    */
00424   return best;
00425 }
00426 /*
00427  *      Selection by arc weight.
00428  */
00429 static Arc
00430 best_successor_2 (Node node)
00431 {
00432   Node src, dest;
00433   Arc ln, best;
00434   src = node;
00435   /*
00436    *  Find an outgoing arc with the highest execution count.
00437    */
00438   best = 0;
00439   for (ln = destinationArcs (src); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00440     {
00441       if (best == 0)
00442         {
00443           best = ln;
00444         }
00445       else
00446         {
00447           if (successor_arc_weight (ln) > successor_arc_weight (best))
00448             best = ln;
00449         }
00450     }
00451   /*
00452    *  The best link must have non-zero weight.
00453    */
00454   if ((best == 0) || (arcWeight (best) == 0.0))
00455     return 0;
00456   dest = destinationNode (best);
00457   /*
00458    *  The destination node must be un-visited.
00459    */
00460   if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
00461     return 0;
00462   /*
00463    *  Return the best link.
00464    */
00465   return best;
00466 }
00467 static Arc
00468 best_predecessor_2 (Node node)
00469 {
00470   Node src, dest;
00471   Arc ln, best;
00472   dest = node;
00473   /*
00474    *  Find an incoming arc with the highest execution count.
00475    */
00476   best = 0;
00477   for (ln = sourceArcs (dest); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00478     {
00479       if (best == 0)
00480         {
00481           best = ln;
00482         }
00483       else
00484         {
00485           if (predecessor_arc_weight (ln) > predecessor_arc_weight (best))
00486             best = ln;
00487         }
00488     }
00489   /*
00490    *  The best link must have non-zero weight.
00491    */
00492   if ((best == 0) || (arcWeight (best) == 0.0))
00493     return 0;
00494   src = sourceNode (best);
00495   /*
00496    *  The source node must be un-visited.
00497    */
00498   if (nodeStatus (src) & VISITED)
00499     return 0;
00500   /*
00501    *  Return the best link.
00502    */
00503   return best;
00504 }
00505 /*
00506  *      Selection by arc weight with minimum branch 
00507  *      probability requirement.
00508  */
00509 static Arc
00510 best_successor_3 (Node node)
00511 {
00512   Node src, dest;
00513   Arc ln, best;
00514   src = node;
00515   /*
00516    *  Find an outgoing arc with the highest execution count.
00517    */
00518   best = 0;
00519   for (ln = destinationArcs (src); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00520     {
00521       if (best == 0)
00522         {
00523           best = ln;
00524         }
00525       else
00526         {
00527           if (successor_arc_weight (ln) > successor_arc_weight (best))
00528             best = ln;
00529         }
00530     }
00531   /*
00532    *  The best link must have non-zero weight.
00533    */
00534   if ((best == 0) || (arcWeight (best) == 0.0))
00535     return 0;
00536   dest = destinationNode (best);
00537   /*
00538    *  The destination node must be un-visited.
00539    */
00540   if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
00541     return 0;
00542   /*
00543    *  Must fulfill the min_prob_requirement.
00544    */
00545   if ((arcWeight (best) / nodeWeight (src)) < min_prob_requirement)
00546     return 0;
00547   if ((arcWeight (best) / nodeWeight (dest)) < min_prob_requirement)
00548     return 0;
00549   /*
00550    *  Return the best link.
00551    */
00552   return best;
00553 }
00554 static Arc
00555 best_predecessor_3 (Node node)
00556 {
00557   Node src, dest;
00558   Arc ln, best;
00559   dest = node;
00560   /*
00561    *  Find an incoming arc with the highest execution count.
00562    */
00563   best = 0;
00564   for (ln = sourceArcs (dest); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00565     {
00566       if (best == 0)
00567         {
00568           best = ln;
00569         }
00570       else
00571         {
00572           if (predecessor_arc_weight (ln) > predecessor_arc_weight (best))
00573             best = ln;
00574         }
00575     }
00576   /*
00577    *  The best link must have non-zero weight.
00578    */
00579   if ((best == 0) || (arcWeight (best) == 0.0))
00580     return 0;
00581   src = sourceNode (best);
00582   /*
00583    *  The source node must be un-visited.
00584    */
00585   if (nodeStatus (src) & VISITED)
00586     return 0;
00587   if ((arcWeight (best) / nodeWeight (src)) < min_prob_requirement)
00588     return 0;
00589   if ((arcWeight (best) / nodeWeight (dest)) < min_prob_requirement)
00590     return 0;
00591   /*
00592    *  Return the best link.
00593    */
00594   return best;
00595 }
00596 /*
00597  *      Heuristic solution to the trace selection problem.
00598  */
00599 static void
00600 SelectTraces (FGraph graph)
00601 {
00602   ST_Entry sorted_list[MAX_GRAPH_SIZE];
00603   int list_length;
00604   Node ptr;
00605   Arc arc;
00606   int n, trace_id;
00607   Node ENTRY;
00608   Node seed, current, last;
00609   struct Ext *extCurrent, *extNext;
00610   /*
00611    *  Compute level information.
00612    */
00613   AddExtensionFields (graph);
00614   /*
00615    *  Mark all nodes unvisited.
00616    *  Also clear all status bits.
00617    */
00618   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00619     {
00620       nodeType (ptr) = 0;       /* trace id = 0 */
00621       nodeStatus (ptr) = NOT_VISITED;
00622       for (arc = sourceArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00623         arcType (arc) = 0;
00624       for (arc = destinationArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00625         arcType (arc) = 0;
00626     }
00627   /*
00628    *  Sort all nodes according to the node weight.
00629    *  From the most important node to the least important node.
00630    */
00631   list_length = 0;
00632   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00633     {
00634       sorted_list[list_length].weight = nodeWeight (ptr);
00635       sorted_list[list_length].ptr = ptr;
00636       sorted_list[list_length].index = list_length;
00637       list_length += 1;
00638       if (list_length >= MAX_GRAPH_SIZE)
00639         Punt ("SelectTrace: graph is too large");
00640     }
00641   max_sort (sorted_list, list_length);  /* library/sort.c */
00642 #ifdef WEIGHT_BASED
00643   /*
00644    *  Give higher priority to the execution weight.
00645    */
00646   ENTRY = graph->root;
00647   trace_id = 1;
00648   for (n = 0; n < list_length; n++)
00649     {
00650       /*
00651        *      Select the highest weight un-visited node.
00652        */
00653       seed = sorted_list[n].ptr;
00654       if (nodeStatus (seed) & VISITED)  /* if visited, try next */
00655         continue;               /* highest node */
00656       /*
00657        *      Start a new trace.
00658        *      Mark seed visited.
00659        */
00660       nodeType (seed) = trace_id++;
00661       nodeStatus (seed) |= VISITED;
00662       /*
00663        *      Grow the trace forward.
00664        */
00665       current = seed;
00666       for (;;)
00667         {
00668           Arc ln, arc;
00669           Node dest;
00670           ln = best_successor_of (current);
00671           if (ln == 0)
00672             {
00673               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00674               break;
00675             }
00676           /*
00677            *  Cannot include ENTRY node.
00678            */
00679           dest = destinationNode (ln);
00680           if (dest == ENTRY)
00681             {
00682               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00683               break;
00684             }
00685           /*
00686            *  Can not include a dominator.
00687            */
00688           extCurrent = nodeExt (current);
00689           extNext = nodeExt (dest);
00690           if ((extCurrent == 0) | (extNext == 0))
00691             {
00692               Punt ("corrupted extension field");
00693             }
00694           if (Set_in (extCurrent->dominator, extNext->order))
00695             {
00696               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00697               break;
00698             }
00699           /*
00700            *  Mark the link selected.
00701            */
00702           arc = FindSrcArc (current, dest, 0);
00703           if (arc != 0)
00704             {
00705               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00706             }
00707           else
00708             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted source link");
00709           arc = FindDestArc (current, dest, 0);
00710           if (arc != 0)
00711             {
00712               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00713             }
00714           else
00715             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted destination link");
00716           /*
00717            *  Add it to the trace.
00718            */
00719           nodeType (dest) = nodeType (seed);
00720           nodeStatus (dest) |= VISITED;
00721           current = dest;
00722         }
00723       /*
00724        *      Grow the trace backward.
00725        */
00726       current = seed;
00727       for (;;)
00728         {
00729           Arc ln, arc;
00730           Node src;
00731           /*
00732            *  Cannot grow from the ENTRY node.
00733            */
00734           if (current == ENTRY)
00735             {
00736               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00737               break;
00738             }
00739           ln = best_predecessor_of (current);
00740           if (ln == 0)
00741             {
00742               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00743               break;
00744             }
00745           src = sourceNode (ln);
00746           /*
00747            *  Can not include a dominee.
00748            */
00749           extCurrent = nodeExt (current);
00750           extNext = nodeExt (src);
00751           if ((extCurrent == 0) | (extNext == 0))
00752             {
00753               Punt ("corrupted extension field");
00754             }
00755           if (Set_in (extNext->dominator, extCurrent->order))
00756             {
00757               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00758               break;
00759             }
00760           /*
00761            *  Mark the link selected.
00762            */
00763           arc = FindSrcArc (src, current, 0);
00764           if (arc != 0)
00765             {
00766               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00767             }
00768           else
00769             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted source link");
00770           arc = FindDestArc (src, current, 0);
00771           if (arc != 0)
00772             {
00773               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00774             }
00775           else
00776             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted destination link");
00777           /*
00778            *  Add it to the trace.
00779            */
00780           nodeType (src) = nodeType (seed);
00781           nodeStatus (src) |= VISITED;
00782           current = src;
00783         }
00784     }
00785 #else
00786   /*
00787    *  Give more attention to the natural flow of the
00788    *  program.
00789    */
00790   ENTRY = graph->root;
00791   trace_id = 1;
00792   current = ENTRY;              /* start from the entry block */
00793   last = 0;
00794   for (n = 0; n < list_length; n++)
00795     {
00796       if (!(nodeStatus (current) & VISITED))
00797         {
00798           /*
00799            *  1) start from the start node first.
00800            */
00801           seed = current;
00802         }
00803       else
00804         {
00805           /*
00806            *  2) select a fall_thru node if possible.
00807            *  3) select the most important node.
00808            */
00809           Node best, dest;
00810           Arc pc;
00811           if (last == 0)
00812             Punt ("this should not happen");
00813           best = 0;
00814           for (pc = destinationArcs (last); pc != 0; pc = nextArc (pc))
00815             {
00816               dest = destinationNode (pc);
00817               if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
00818                 continue;
00819               if (best == 0)
00820                 {
00821                   best = dest;
00822                 }
00823               else
00824                 if (successor_node_weight (last, dest)
00825                     > successor_node_weight (last, best))
00826                 {
00827                   best = dest;
00828                 }
00829             }
00830           if (best == 0)
00831             {
00832               int k;
00833               for (k = 0; k < list_length; k++)
00834                 {
00835                   dest = (Node) sorted_list[k].ptr;
00836                   if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
00837                     continue;
00838                   best = dest;
00839                   break;
00840                 }
00841             }
00842           if (best == 0)
00843             {
00844               break;
00845             }
00846           seed = best;
00847         }
00848       if (nodeStatus (seed) & VISITED)
00849         Punt ("incorrect seed selection");
00850       /*
00851        *      Start a new trace.
00852        *      Mark seed visited.
00853        */
00854       nodeType (seed) = trace_id++;
00855       nodeStatus (seed) |= VISITED;
00856       /*
00857        *      Grow the trace forward.
00858        */
00859       current = seed;
00860       for (;;)
00861         {
00862           Arc ln, arc;
00863           Node dest;
00864           ln = best_successor_of (current);
00865           if (ln == 0)
00866             {
00867               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00868               break;
00869             }
00870           /*
00871            *  Cannot include ENTRY node.
00872            */
00873           dest = destinationNode (ln);
00874           if (dest == ENTRY)
00875             {
00876               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00877               break;
00878             }
00879           /*
00880            *  Can not include a dominator.
00881            */
00882           extCurrent = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (current);
00883           extNext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (dest);
00884           if ((extCurrent == 0) || (extNext == 0))
00885             {
00886               Punt ("corrupted extension field");
00887             }
00888           if (Set_in (extCurrent->dominator, extNext->order))
00889             {
00890               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_TAIL;
00891               break;
00892             }
00893           /*
00894            *  Mark the link selected.
00895            */
00896           arc = FindSrcArc (current, dest, 0);
00897           if (arc != 0)
00898             {
00899               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00900             }
00901           else
00902             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted source link");
00903           arc = FindDestArc (current, dest, 0);
00904           if (arc != 0)
00905             {
00906               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00907             }
00908           else
00909             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted destination link");
00910           /*
00911            *  Add it to the trace.
00912            */
00913           nodeType (dest) = nodeType (seed);
00914           nodeStatus (dest) |= VISITED;
00915           current = dest;
00916         }
00917       last = current;
00918       /*
00919        *      Grow the trace backward.
00920        */
00921       current = seed;
00922       for (;;)
00923         {
00924           Arc ln, arc;
00925           Node src;
00926           /*
00927            *  Cannot grow from the ENTRY node.
00928            */
00929           if (current == ENTRY)
00930             {
00931               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00932               break;
00933             }
00934           ln = best_predecessor_of (current);
00935           if (ln == 0)
00936             {
00937               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00938               break;
00939             }
00940           src = sourceNode (ln);
00941           /*
00942            *  Can not include a dominee.
00943            */
00944           extCurrent = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (current);
00945           extNext = (struct Ext *) nodeExt (src);
00946           if ((extCurrent == 0) || (extNext == 0))
00947             {
00948               Punt ("corrupted extension field");
00949             }
00950           if (Set_in (extNext->dominator, extCurrent->order))
00951             {
00952               nodeStatus (current) |= TRACE_HEAD;
00953               break;
00954             }
00955           /*
00956            *  Mark the link selected.
00957            */
00958           arc = FindSrcArc (src, current, 0);
00959           if (arc != 0)
00960             {
00961               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00962             }
00963           else
00964             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted source link");
00965           arc = FindDestArc (src, current, 0);
00966           if (arc != 0)
00967             {
00968               arcType (arc) = nodeType (seed);
00969             }
00970           else
00971             Punt ("SelectTraces: corrupted destination link");
00972           /*
00973            *  Add it to the trace.
00974            */
00975           nodeType (src) = nodeType (seed);
00976           nodeStatus (src) |= VISITED;
00977           current = src;
00978         }
00979     }
00980 #endif
00981   /*
00982    *  Make sure that all nodes have been visited.
00983    */
00984   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00985     {
00986       if (!(nodeStatus (ptr) & VISITED))
00987         Punt ("SelectTraces: failed to select all nodes");
00988     }
00989   /*  
00990    *  Detect inner loops.
00991    */
00992   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
00993     {
00994       Arc ln;
00995       if (!(nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_TAIL))
00996         continue;
00997       for (ln = destinationArcs (ptr); ln != 0; ln = nextArc (ln))
00998         {
00999           Node dest;
01000           dest = destinationNode (ln);
01001           if ((nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD) &&
01002               (nodeType (dest) == nodeType (ptr)))
01003             {
01004               nodeStatus (dest) |= LOOP_HEAD;
01005               break;
01006             }
01007         }
01008     }
01009 }
01010 /*
01011  *      Trace selection by sorting all arcs and
01012  *      select from the most important to the least important.
01013  */
01014 void
01015 SelectBySortArc (FGraph graph)
01016 {
01017 #define MAX_SIZE (MAX_GRAPH_SIZE*2)
01018   ST_Entry sorted_list[MAX_SIZE];       /* expected fan-out = 2 */
01019   register int list_length;
01020   Node node_list[MAX_GRAPH_SIZE];
01021   register int node_list_length;
01022   register Node ptr;
01023   register Arc arc;
01024   register int i;
01025   int next_trace_id;
01026   /*
01027    *  Mark all nodes unvisited.
01028    *  Also clear all status bits.
01029    */
01030   node_list_length = 0;
01031   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01032     {
01033       node_list[node_list_length++] = ptr;
01034       if (node_list_length >= MAX_GRAPH_SIZE)
01035         Punt ("SelectBySortArc: graph is too large");
01036       nodeType (ptr) = 0;       /* trace id = 0 */
01037       nodeStatus (ptr) = NOT_VISITED;
01038       for (arc = sourceArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01039         arcType (arc) = 0;
01040       for (arc = destinationArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01041         arcType (arc) = 0;
01042     }
01043   /*
01044    *  Place all outgoing arcs in the list.
01045    *  Sort all arcs by weight.
01046    */
01047   list_length = 0;
01048   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01049     {
01050       for (arc = destinationArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01051         {
01052           sorted_list[list_length].weight = arcWeight (arc);
01053           sorted_list[list_length].ptr = arc;
01054           list_length += 1;
01055           if (list_length >= MAX_SIZE)
01056             Punt ("SelectBySortArc: graph is too large");
01057         }
01058     }
01059   max_sort (sorted_list, list_length);  /* library/sort.c */
01060   /*
01061    *  From the most important arc to the least important arc,
01062    *  connect basic blocks into traces.
01063    */
01064   next_trace_id = 1;
01065   for (i = 0; i < list_length; i++)
01066     {
01067       int trace_id;
01068       Node src, dest;
01069       arc = (Arc) sorted_list[i].ptr;
01070       src = sourceNode (arc);
01071       dest = destinationNode (arc);
01072       /*
01073        *      Check if this arc can still be selected.
01074        *      dest cannot be the root of the graph.
01075        *      case1 : src = free node, dest = free node
01076        *      case2 : src is a tail node, dest is a head node,
01077        *              except when src and dest belong to the same trace.
01078        */
01079       if (dest == graph->root)
01080         continue;
01081       if (!
01082           ((nodeStatus (src) == NOT_VISITED)
01083            || (nodeStatus (src) & TRACE_TAIL)))
01084         continue;
01085       if (!
01086           ((nodeStatus (dest) == NOT_VISITED)
01087            || (nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD)))
01088         continue;
01089       /*
01090        *      If both src and dest are defined (in some trace),
01091        *      we do not allow this connection if src and dest
01092        *      belong to the same trace.
01093        *      This takes care of self-recursions.
01094        */
01095       if ((nodeStatus (src) & TRACE_TAIL) && (nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD))
01096         if (nodeType (src) == nodeType (dest))
01097           continue;
01098       /*
01099        *      It is also not allow to connect, when src and dest
01100        *      are the same node.
01101        */
01102       if (src == dest)
01103         continue;
01104       /*
01105        *      After connection, src will no longer be tail, and
01106        *      dest will no longer be head.
01107        */
01108       nodeStatus (src) &= ~TRACE_TAIL;
01109       nodeStatus (dest) &= ~TRACE_HEAD;
01110       /*
01111        *      Now this arc can be selected.
01112        */
01113       if (nodeStatus (src) & VISITED)
01114         {
01115           trace_id = nodeType (src);
01116           arcType (arc) = trace_id;
01117           /*
01118            *  If the dest node is in another trace, need to
01119            *  combine the two traces.
01120            */
01121           if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
01122             {
01123               register int j;
01124               register int bad_id = nodeType (dest);
01125               /*
01126                * For all nodes of type (nodeType(dest)), change
01127                * to trace_id.
01128                */
01129               for (j = 0; j < node_list_length; j++)
01130                 if (nodeType (node_list[j]) == bad_id)
01131                   nodeType (node_list[j]) = trace_id;
01132               /*
01133                * For all arcs of type (nodeType(dest)), change
01134                * to trace_id.
01135                */
01136               for (j = 0; j < list_length; j++)
01137                 {
01138                   Arc ac;
01139                   ac = (Arc) sorted_list[j].ptr;
01140                   if (arcType (ac) == bad_id)
01141                     arcType (ac) = trace_id;
01142                 }
01143             }
01144           else
01145             {
01146               /*
01147                * If dest is still a free node, it becomes the
01148                * trace tail.
01149                */
01150               nodeStatus (dest) |= (VISITED | TRACE_TAIL);
01151               nodeType (dest) = trace_id;
01152             }
01153         }
01154       else if (nodeStatus (dest) & VISITED)
01155         {
01156           trace_id = nodeType (dest);
01157           arcType (arc) = trace_id;
01158           /*
01159            *  Since src is a free node, src becomes a trace head.
01160            */
01161           nodeStatus (src) |= (VISITED | TRACE_HEAD);
01162           nodeType (src) = trace_id;
01163         }
01164       else
01165         {
01166           trace_id = next_trace_id++;
01167           arcType (arc) = trace_id;
01168           nodeStatus (src) |= (VISITED | TRACE_HEAD);
01169           nodeType (src) = trace_id;
01170           nodeStatus (dest) |= (VISITED | TRACE_TAIL);
01171           nodeType (dest) = trace_id;
01172         }
01173     }
01174   /*
01175    *  The remaining NOT_VISITED nodes, each forms a trace.
01176    */
01177   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01178     {
01179       if (nodeStatus (ptr) & VISITED)
01180         continue;
01181       nodeStatus (ptr) |= (VISITED | TRACE_HEAD | TRACE_TAIL);
01182       nodeType (ptr) = next_trace_id++;
01183     }
01184   /*
01185    *  Detect inner loops.
01186    */
01187   for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01188     {
01189       if (!(nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_TAIL))
01190         continue;
01191       for (arc = destinationArcs (ptr); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01192         {
01193           Node dest;
01194           dest = destinationNode (arc);
01195           if ((nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD) &&
01196               (nodeType (dest) == nodeType (ptr)))
01197             {
01198               nodeStatus (dest) |= LOOP_HEAD;
01199               break;
01200             }
01201         }
01202     }
01203 }
01204 /*
01205  *      Places traces in a particular linear order
01206  *      to maximize sequential transition.
01207  *      A good way to achieve this is to construct a
01208  *      higher level graph, using traces as nodes.
01209  *      An arc is added between traces whose head
01210  *      and tail are connected by a transition.
01211  */
01212 static void
01213 PlaceTraces (FGraph graph)
01214 {
01215   FGraph new_graph;
01216   Node node, current;
01217   Node node_order[MAX_GRAPH_SIZE];
01218   int i, size;
01219 #ifndef SECOND_LEVEL_SELECT
01220   int min_trace_id, max_trace_id;
01221 #endif
01222   if (graph->nodes == 0)
01223     return;
01224 #ifdef SECOND_LEVEL_SELECT
01225   new_graph = NewGraph ();      /* create a high level graph */
01226   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01227     {
01228       int trace_id;
01229       Node temp;
01230       trace_id = nodeType (node);
01231       temp = FindNode (new_graph, trace_id);
01232       if (temp == 0)
01233         {
01234           temp = NewNode ();
01235           nodeId (temp) = trace_id;
01236           AddNode (new_graph, temp);
01237         }
01238       if (node == graph->root)
01239         new_graph->root = temp;
01240     }
01241   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01242     {
01243       Arc arc;
01244       if (!(nodeStatus (node) & TRACE_TAIL))
01245         continue;
01246       /*
01247        *      Find transitions to the head of other traces.
01248        *      Inner loop back-edge is not considered.
01249        */
01250       for (arc = destinationArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01251         {
01252           Node dest;
01253           dest = destinationNode (arc);
01254           if ((nodeType (dest) != nodeType (node)) &&
01255               (nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD))
01256             {
01257               /*
01258                *      Add a link (trace[node]->trace[dest])
01259                */
01260               int src_trace_id, dest_trace_id;
01261               Node src_node, dest_node;
01262               Arc ar;
01263               src_trace_id = nodeType (node);
01264               dest_trace_id = nodeType (dest);
01265               src_node = FindNode (new_graph, src_trace_id);
01266               dest_node = FindNode (new_graph, dest_trace_id);
01267               ConnectNodes (src_node, dest_node, 0);
01268               ar = FindSrcArc (src_node, dest_node, 0);
01269               arcWeight (ar) = arcWeight (arc);
01270               ar = FindDestArc (src_node, dest_node, 0);
01271               arcWeight (ar) = arcWeight (arc);
01272             }
01273         }
01274     }
01275   /*
01276    *  Simply assign the node weights to max(connecting arc)
01277    */
01278   for (node = new_graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01279     {
01280       Arc arc;
01281       double max = 1.0;
01282       for (arc = sourceArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01283         if (arcWeight (arc) > max)
01284           max = arcWeight (arc);
01285       for (arc = destinationArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01286         if (arcWeight (arc) > max)
01287           max = arcWeight (arc);
01288       nodeWeight (node) = max;
01289     }
01290   /*
01291    *  Apply SelectTraces() on the new graph.
01292    *  Use SELECT_BY_ARC_WEIGHT
01293    */
01294   best_successor_of = best_successor_2;
01295   best_predecessor_of = best_predecessor_2;
01296   SelectTraces (new_graph);
01297   /*
01298    *  Determine the best sequential order of the traces.
01299    *  Essentially, we have the original problem again.
01300    *  However, after the second level trace selection,
01301    *  we expect most of the sequential transitions are
01302    *  captured. A naive heuristic is sufficient here.
01303    *  The sequential order must start with the ENTRY trace.
01304    */
01305 #ifdef DEBUG_TRACE1
01306   printf ("... second level graph = \n");
01307   WriteGraph ("stdout", new_graph);
01308 #endif
01309   /*
01310    *  Clear the valid bit of all nodes.
01311    */
01312   for (node = new_graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01313     {
01314       nodeStatus (node) &= ~VISITED;
01315     }
01316   /*
01317    *  Start from the root node.
01318    */
01319   size = 0;
01320   current = new_graph->root;
01321   while (current != 0)
01322     {
01323       Node ptr;
01324       Arc ar;
01325       int trace_id;
01326       if (nodeStatus (current) & VISITED)
01327         Punt ("PlaceTraces: reached a VISITed node");
01328       nodeStatus (current) |= VISITED;
01329       trace_id = nodeId (current);
01330       /*
01331        *      Layout the trace.
01332        */
01333       for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01334         {
01335           if ((nodeType (ptr) == trace_id) && (nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_HEAD))
01336             break;              /* find the starting node of the trace */
01337         }
01338       if (ptr == 0)
01339         Punt ("PlaceTraces: internal error (1)");
01340       while (ptr != 0)
01341         {
01342           Arc next;
01343           node_order[size++] = ptr;
01344           /*
01345            *  Follow the in-trace transition.
01346            */
01347           if (nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_TAIL)
01348             break;              /* reached the end of trace */
01349           for (next = destinationArcs (ptr); next != 0; next = nextArc (next))
01350             {
01351               if (arcType (next) == nodeType (ptr))
01352                 break;          /* find a in-trace transition */
01353             }
01354           if (next == 0)
01355             break;
01356           ptr = destinationNode (next);
01357         }
01358       /*
01359        *      Select the next trace to be visited next.
01360        *      Follow an in-trace transition (of the higher level
01361        *      graph) if possible. 
01362        */
01363       for (ar = destinationArcs (current); ar != 0; ar = nextArc (ar))
01364         {
01365           if (arcType (ar) == nodeType (current))
01366             break;              /* find an in-trace transition */
01367         }
01368       if (ar != 0)
01369         {                       /* transition is still in-trace */
01370           current = destinationNode (ar);
01371         }
01372       else
01373         {                       /* must find another trace */
01374           /*
01375            *  Find the most important trace left.
01376            */
01377           Node nn, best;
01378           best = 0;
01379           for (nn = new_graph->nodes; nn != 0; nn = nextNode (nn))
01380             {
01381               if (nodeStatus (nn) & VISITED)
01382                 continue;       /* skip over VISITED nodes */
01383               if (!(nodeStatus (nn) & TRACE_HEAD))
01384                 continue;       /* skip over non-trace headers */
01385               if (best == 0)
01386                 {
01387                   best = nn;
01388                 }
01389               else
01390                 {
01391                   if (nodeWeight (nn) > nodeWeight (best))
01392                     best = nn;
01393                 }
01394             }
01395           current = best;       /* go out of trace if best=0 */
01396         }
01397     }
01398   /*
01399    *  Make sure that all traces have been layout.
01400    */
01401   for (node = new_graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01402     {
01403       if (!(nodeStatus (node) & VISITED))
01404         {
01405           Punt ("PlaceTraces: missing some traces");
01406         }
01407     }
01408   /*
01409    *  No longer need the higher level graph.
01410    */
01411   FreeGraph (&new_graph);       /* destroy the high level graph */
01412 #else
01413   min_trace_id = 0x1FFFFFFF;
01414   max_trace_id = -0x1FFFFFFF;
01415   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01416     {
01417       int trace_id;
01418       trace_id = nodeType (node);
01419       if (trace_id > max_trace_id)
01420         max_trace_id = trace_id;
01421       if (trace_id < min_trace_id)
01422         min_trace_id = trace_id;
01423     }
01424   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01425     {
01426       nodeStatus (node) &= ~VISITED;
01427     }
01428   size = 0;
01429   for (i = min_trace_id; i <= max_trace_id; i++)
01430     {
01431       Node ptr;
01432       /*
01433        * 1. find the trace header.
01434        */
01435       for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01436         {
01437           if ((nodeType (ptr) == i) & ((nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_HEAD) != 0))
01438             break;
01439         }
01440       if (ptr == 0)
01441         continue;
01442       while (ptr != 0)
01443         {
01444           Arc next;
01445           if (nodeStatus (ptr) & VISITED)
01446             Punt ("PlaceTraces: visited a node twice");
01447           nodeStatus (ptr) |= VISITED;
01448           node_order[size++] = ptr;
01449           if (nodeStatus (ptr) & TRACE_TAIL)
01450             break;
01451           for (next = destinationArcs (ptr); next != 0; next = nextArc (next))
01452             {
01453               if (arcType (next) == nodeType (ptr))
01454                 break;
01455             }
01456           if (next == 0)
01457             break;
01458           ptr = destinationNode (next);
01459         }
01460     }
01461   /*
01462    *  Make sure that all traces have been layout.
01463    */
01464   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01465     {
01466       if (!(nodeStatus (node) & VISITED))
01467         {
01468           fprintf (stderr, "min trace id = %d\n", min_trace_id);
01469           fprintf (stderr, "max trace id = %d\n", max_trace_id);
01470           fprintf (stderr, "size = %d\n", size);
01471           WriteGraph ("stderr", graph);
01472           Punt ("PlaceTraces: missing some traces");
01473         }
01474     }
01475 #endif
01476   /*
01477    *  Rearrange the order of nodes, according to the
01478    *  node_order[] order.
01479    */
01480   node_order[size] = 0;
01481   for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
01482     {
01483       nextNode (node_order[i]) = node_order[i + 1];
01484     }
01485   graph->nodes = node_order[0];
01486 }
01487 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01488 /*
01489  *      Apple trace selection on a given graph.
01490  */
01491 void
01492 TraceSelection (FGraph graph, int method, double min_prob)
01493 {
01494   if (graph == 0)
01495     Punt ("TraceSelection: nil graph");
01496   if ((min_prob < 0.0) || (min_prob > 1.0))
01497     Punt ("TraceSelection: min_prob must be within [0..1]");
01498 #ifdef DEBUG
01499   printf ("### BEFORE\n");
01500   WriteGraph ("stdout", graph);
01501 #endif
01502   /*
01503    *  The old selection program.
01504    */
01505   switch (method)
01506     {
01507     case SELECT_BY_NODE_WEIGHT:
01508       best_successor_of = best_successor_1;
01509       best_predecessor_of = best_predecessor_1;
01510       min_prob_requirement = 0;
01511       SelectTraces (graph);
01512       PlaceTraces (graph);
01513       break;
01514     case SELECT_BY_ARC_WEIGHT:
01515       best_successor_of = best_successor_2;
01516       best_predecessor_of = best_predecessor_2;
01517       min_prob_requirement = 0;
01518       SelectTraces (graph);
01519       PlaceTraces (graph);
01520       break;
01521     case SELECT_BY_MIN_PROB:
01522       best_successor_of = best_successor_3;
01523       best_predecessor_of = best_predecessor_3;
01524       min_prob_requirement = min_prob;
01525       SelectTraces (graph);
01526       PlaceTraces (graph);
01527       break;
01528     case SELECT_BY_MAX_ARC:
01529       SelectBySortArc (graph);
01530       PlaceTraces (graph);
01531       break;
01532     default:
01533       Punt ("TraceSelection: illegal selection method");
01534     }
01535 #ifdef DEBUG
01536   printf ("### AFTER\n");
01537   WriteGraph ("stdout", graph);
01538 #endif
01539 }
01540 /*
01541  *      Measure the trace selection result.
01542  *      Trace selection must have been applied.
01543  */
01544 void
01545 ReportSelectionResult (FGraph graph, double *matrix)
01546 {
01547   int i;
01548   Node node;
01549   Arc arc;
01550   if (graph == 0)
01551     Punt ("ReportSelectionResult: nil graph");
01552   if (matrix == 0)
01553     return;
01554   for (i = 0; i <= N_LEAF; i++)
01555     matrix[i] = 0.0;
01556   /*
01557    *  Compute the sequential locality.
01558    */
01559   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01560     {
01561       Arc ptr;
01562       Node next_node;
01563       next_node = nextNode (node);
01564       if (next_node == 0)       /* ignore the last node */
01565         break;
01566       for (ptr = destinationArcs (node); ptr != 0; ptr = nextArc (ptr))
01567         {
01568           if (destinationNode (ptr) == next_node)
01569             {
01570               matrix[W_SEQUENTIAL] += arcWeight (ptr);
01571             }
01572         }
01573     }
01574   /*
01575    *  Measure various transition counts.
01576    */
01577   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01578     {
01579       for (arc = destinationArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01580         {
01581           Node src, dest;
01582           int Sh, St, Dh, Dt;
01583           src = sourceNode (arc);
01584           dest = destinationNode (arc);
01585           Sh = nodeStatus (src) & TRACE_HEAD;
01586           St = nodeStatus (src) & TRACE_TAIL;
01587           Dh = nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_HEAD;
01588           Dt = nodeStatus (dest) & TRACE_TAIL;
01589           if ((arcType (arc) != 0) && (arcType (arc) == nodeType (node)))
01590             {
01591               /*
01592                *      In-trace.
01593                */
01594               matrix[W_E] += arcWeight (arc);
01595             }
01596           else if (arcType (arc) != 0)
01597             {
01598               Punt ("ReportSelectionResult: illegal arc type");
01599             }
01600           else
01601             {
01602               if (St && Dh)
01603                 {               /* terminal to head */
01604                   matrix[W_A] += arcWeight (arc);
01605                   /* detect loop back-edge */
01606                   if (nodeType (src) == nodeType (dest))
01607                     {
01608                       matrix[W_BACK_EDGE] += arcWeight (arc);
01609                     }
01610                 }
01611               else if (St && !Dh)
01612                 {               /* terminal to middle */
01613                   matrix[W_B] += arcWeight (arc);
01614                 }
01615               else if (!St && Dh)
01616                 {               /* middle to head */
01617                   matrix[W_C] += arcWeight (arc);
01618                 }
01619               else
01620                 {               /* middle to middle */
01621                   matrix[W_D] += arcWeight (arc);
01622                 }
01623             }
01624         }
01625     }
01626 #ifdef DEBUG_TRACE2
01627   if (matrix[W_E] > matrix[W_SEQUENTIAL])
01628     {
01629       WriteGraph ("zzz.debug", graph);
01630       fprintf (stderr, "in-trace = %f\n", matrix[W_E]);
01631       fprintf (stderr, "sequential = %f\n", matrix[W_SEQUENTIAL]);
01632       Punt ("ReportSelection: incorrect in-trace");
01633     }
01634 #endif
01635   /*
01636    *  Measure several graph parameters.
01637    */
01638   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01639     {
01640       nodeStatus (node) &= ~VISITED;    /* borrow the valid bit */
01641       matrix[N_NODES] += 1.0;
01642       matrix[W_NODES] += nodeWeight (node);
01643       if (destinationArcs (node) == 0)
01644         {
01645           matrix[N_LEAF] += 1.0;
01646         }
01647       if (sourceArcs (node) == 0)
01648         {
01649           matrix[N_ROOT] += 1.0;
01650         }
01651       for (arc = destinationArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
01652         {
01653           matrix[N_ARCS] += 1.0;
01654           matrix[W_ARCS] += arcWeight (arc);
01655         }
01656     }
01657   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
01658     {
01659       Node ptr;
01660       int trace_id, loop, size;
01661       if (nodeStatus (node) & VISITED)
01662         continue;
01663       trace_id = nodeType (node);
01664       loop = 0;
01665       size = 0;
01666       for (ptr = graph->nodes; ptr != 0; ptr = nextNode (ptr))
01667         {
01668           if (nodeType (ptr) == trace_id)
01669             {
01670               nodeStatus (ptr) |= VISITED;
01671               size++;
01672               loop |= (nodeStatus (node) & LOOP_HEAD);
01673             }
01674         }
01675       matrix[N_TRACE] += 1.0;
01676       matrix[L_TRACE] += size;
01677       if (loop)
01678         {
01679           matrix[N_LOOP] += 1.0;
01680           matrix[L_LOOP] += size;
01681         }
01682     }
01683   if (matrix[L_TRACE] != matrix[N_NODES])
01684     Punt ("ReportSelectionResult: incorrect accounting");
01685   if (matrix[N_TRACE] != 0.0)
01686     matrix[L_TRACE] /= matrix[N_TRACE];
01687   if (matrix[N_LOOP] != 0.0)
01688     matrix[L_LOOP] /= matrix[N_LOOP];
01689 }
01690 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01691 
01692 #ifdef DEBUG_TRACE
01693 #include <library/io.h>
01694 main (argc, argv)
01695      int argc;
01696      char **argv;
01697 {
01698   FGraph g;
01699   double stat[17];
01700   int i, n;
01701   if (argc < 2)
01702     Punt ("trace N");
01703   n = atoi (argv[1]);
01704   /* get a graph from input */
01705   g = ReadGraph ("stdin");
01706   printf ("> Original graph\n");
01707   WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01708   fflush (stdout);
01709   /* apply trace selection */
01710   switch (n)
01711     {
01712     case 0:
01713       printf ("> Selection by arc weight (min_prob=.80)\n");
01714       TraceSelection (g, SELECT_BY_MIN_PROB, 0.80);
01715       ReportSelectionResult (g, stat);
01716       WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01717       for (i = 0; i <= 16; i++)
01718         {
01719           printf ("  %f\n", stat[i]);
01720         }
01721       fflush (stdout);
01722       break;
01723     case 1:
01724       printf ("> Selection by arc weight (min_prob=.70)\n");
01725       TraceSelection (g, SELECT_BY_MIN_PROB, 0.70);
01726       ReportSelectionResult (g, stat);
01727       WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01728       for (i = 0; i <= 16; i++)
01729         {
01730           printf ("  %f\n", stat[i]);
01731         }
01732       fflush (stdout);
01733       break;
01734     case 2:
01735       printf ("> Selection by arc weight\n");
01736       TraceSelection (g, SELECT_BY_ARC_WEIGHT, 0.0);
01737       ReportSelectionResult (g, stat);
01738       WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01739       for (i = 0; i <= 16; i++)
01740         {
01741           printf ("  %f\n", stat[i]);
01742         }
01743       fflush (stdout);
01744       break;
01745     case 3:
01746       printf ("> Selection by sort all arcs\n");
01747       TraceSelection (g, SELECT_BY_MAX_ARC, 0.70);
01748       ReportSelectionResult (g, stat);
01749       WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01750       for (i = 0; i <= 16; i++)
01751         {
01752           printf ("  %f\n", stat[i]);
01753         }
01754       fflush (stdout);
01755       break;
01756     case 4:
01757       printf ("> Selection by node weight\n");
01758       TraceSelection (g, SELECT_BY_NODE_WEIGHT, 0.0);
01759       ReportSelectionResult (g, stat);
01760       WriteGraph ("stdout", g);
01761       for (i = 0; i <= 16; i++)
01762         {
01763           printf ("  %f\n", stat[i]);
01764         }
01765       fflush (stdout);
01766       break;
01767     default:
01768       break;
01769     }
01770 }
01771 #endif
